msbt.message: The big Turkey Day extravaganza is starting soon, ! You excited yet?We've got a world-class chef coming here to show us what real food tastes like. Bring your appetite!
Big day for foodies today! Preheat your ovens, 'cause Turkey Day is gonna start soon!Can't wait to see what kinda dishes they serve up. I could use some new inspiration, .

Welp, it's here. Turkey Day, I mean.The bash at the plaza is the main event, and I'll get there. But right now, I'm gonna stay here and cook.Oh, y'know what'd be good? Drop by if you got time. I could use some company while I cook, !
